attributes.action: Should England become an independent Country?
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Scotland has been given the right, and fairly so, to decide their own future. The outcome of which has been to reject independence and stay as part of the UK. This vote of five million people has had a profond effect on the other people of the UK, especially England, a population of fifty five million.
 We should be given the same right, to have our say in what we want, and asking the English people the same question that was proposed to the Scotish people.

 Should England become an independent Country?

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: England To Leave The UK Referendum

Created by: Jon Mitchell

Closing: 30/03/2015
